title: metrica
descr: Responsive and cross-browser site with unique design for creative agency (RU)
fullDescr: Responsive and cross-browser site with unique design for creative agency (RU). Website was made for a company which creates brands, marketing strategies and different creative ideas. A unique design was developed, simple and intuitive to use, also optimized in google speed, where it scored high marks (92). Designed from the scratch using the technical stack above.
stack: UX / UI / HTML / CSS / JS / SEO

title: rest-app
descr: SPA application for managing orders from customers in restaurant
fullDescr: SPA for managing orders from customers in restaurant. SPA was created for a restaurant business, some restaurants was able to connect to this system, where they had the ability to manage delivery, accept and give orders to couriers who delivered the product to the buyer. This application was developed using VueJS FE-part and NodeJS for BE-part.

title: ballonbar
descr: Responsive site as online-shop, built on WordPress (CA)
fullDescr: Responsive site as online-shop, built on WordPress (CA). Website was developed for the business of balloons and various installations for different events. While developing, was decided to make eshop, where customer could order products, make payment and get delivery. The website was made on CMS Wordpress using different plugins, including Woocommerce.

title: rex-stat
descr: Web-application for analyzing data from thematic communities from social network (DataVisualization)
fullDescr: Web-application for analyzing data from thematic communities from social network. Web-app was created within the framework of my own project on master's degree project, the purpose of the app is to collect and analyze statistics from various groups and communities in the social network (Vkontakte), qualitative and quantitative indicators were used to determine the coverage, number, dynamics of users, as well as how they perceive thematic information. Further, the data obtained were used to model the behavior of group members (SIRS model from medicine) in order to predict their dynamics and coverage of information inside this group. App was created using ReactJS, ChartJS for FE-part and NodeJs, VKAPI, MongoDb for BE-part.
stack: NodeJs / MongoDB / ReactJs / JSX / ChartJs / VK API / CSS

title: nom
descr: Web-application for food delivery from different vendors
fullDescr: Web-application, food delivery from different vendors. Web-app for the food delivery to customers, who had the opportunity to choose products from various cafes and restaraunts, choose their location using map and adress field and able to make payment. FE-part developed using VueJS and different libraries, for example YmapsAPI for interactions with location. BE-part was already developed by another developers.

fullDescr: Responsive and cross-browser site with unique and minimalistic design for artisan (RU). Website was developed for the craft buisness, customers have ability to leave applications which directly come to artisan. Developed unique design with high perfomance and also made SEO optimization in Google and Yandex search systems.
stack: UX / UI / HTML / CSS / JS / SEO / jQuery
